alert.note: Alert for Baltimore; Baltimore City; Cecil; Harford; Howard (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 4:30PM EDT until July 29 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Baltimore City in northern Maryland... Northeastern Howard County in central Maryland... Harford County in northern Maryland... Cecil County in northeastern Maryland... Central Baltimore County in northern Maryland... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 430 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jarrettsville to near Fallston to Milford Mill, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Baltimore, Pikesville, Middle River, Cockeysville, Elkton, Aberdeen, Havre De Grace, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Calvert, Dundalk, Towson, Bel Air South, Catonsville, Essex, Randallstown, Parkville, Owings Mills, Bel Air North, Carney and Milford Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Sterling Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Baltimore; Baltimore City; Cecil; Harford; Howard
